name: Catniss and the Phantom Candies / Cute 3D Spooky Browser /
name_original: Catniss and the Phantom Candies / Cute 3D Spooky Browser /
description:
For best experience download and play! 

Phantom candies are mythical candies that are said to be so good that they take you to another realm. Catniss finds out the hard way that this myth is more of a reality! Now you have to help her find all the candies, before it's too late.

                                              

 W/S/A/D - move
SPACE- jump
SHIFT - run
E - interact
W/S - up and down

                                                  

Mels - Environment, Code

Red Car Studios - Characters, Animations

And a special thanks to IrishJohnGames for helping with code

                                           

                                           

Unity Assets

Crest Water
